credentialTypeUri.description: Term URI from the Education Credential Type vocabulary (vocabulary/domains/education/credential-type.v1.0.0.json).

programOutcomeTypeUri.description: Term URI from the Education Program Outcome Type vocabulary (vocabulary/domains/education/program-outcome-type.v1.0.0.json).

issuedByRef.description: Reference to the Education Institution entity that issued the credential.

awardedToRef.description: Reference to the Person Participant entity who holds the credential.

programRef.description: Optional reference to the Education Program entity the credential is associated with.
